name: Friday Night Funkin - Unity Remake (DEMO)
description:
This is friday night funkin, but made in unity, and with my bad code, but I promise it's good, this took like 4-5 months or more, so far there are four songs complete!

those being:

- All songs from week 1

- and Tricky for some reason

ALSO it's not finished yet, I'm still working on it
